Malden.Benjamin Hoyt House:
The Benjamin Hoyt House is a historic house located at 134 Otis Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 2-1/2 story wood frame house was built in 1868, and is one of the only bracketed Italianate houses to survive in East Cambridge. It has a front-facing gable whose cornice includes dentil moulding and brackets, and whose fully pedimented gable end has a round-arch window in the tympanum area.
